Audio.Locality: Estacao Ecologica de Jatai - Luis Antonio, Sao Paulo State
Audio.Author: Bruno Arantes de Andrade Bueno
Audio.Comments: Recorded at border of a water stream in a patch of regenerating Cerrado sensu strictu vegetation. The main song was uttered as the two birds performed a display by opening and shaking their tails and wings.bird-seen:yesplayback-used:yes
